page.title: 19Life Styles
page.content: On asking for change of life styles since the 2nd. war, we had a surprising answer from a prominent local-retired councillor. During the war he was stationed at Cassino, south of Rome, and on gazing up at the local monastery, and at the dead bodies at his feet, wondered how God could allow such use of one of his retreats, as an enemy base. At that moment he decided to change his life and start to dedicate himself to helping others in some way. On returning home he eventually became involved with the Parish Council, and was nominated onto Nidderdale Rural District Council. On the re-organisation of local councils, he was elected onto Harrogate District Council although now retired from it,he is still active at village level.
